website_summaries.verdict: The vivid colors and 3D arrangement of the base sets this one apart.
pros: Turtles appeal to a wide range of people, so this high-quality globe works well for gift-giving
There's lots of detail in the figurines, and it's made of poly resin for durability

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing, arrived with a broken bowl. The design is beautiful, the colors are also beautiful. I ordered for my granddaughter who is obsessed with turtles. I'm glad I opened it before I gave to her. It could of caused more issues than it already did.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, one day shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift! I went on vacation to Florida and somehow ended up one souvenir short for my work team when I unpacked my bags. I had gotten all the other gifts at a store in Florida that had these little snow globes with different beach themes. This was the exact size and arrived the NEXT DAY! (So i could give everyone their gifts). My coworker still has this one on his desk :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Just so nice <3
customer_reviews.text: This snow globe is perfect in every way IMOP . so nice looking , cute , more than cute . perfect size for what I wanted it for . The price is right . I love the green coloring I was surprised , so it makes it more perfect. I would buy one again and surely recommend it . 5 stars all around .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Davis

customer_reviews.title: pretty but expensive
customer_reviews.text: i didnt see the size of this when i ordered it and had i known it was so small i wouldn't have bought it. Considering the price of it. I gave it as a gift while they loved it, i felt that it should have been a full size snowglobe for the price
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: ToitleGlob
customer_reviews.text: Its an ocean globe.... I mean there wasnt anything bad or outstanfinf about it. It did its job, made my friend happy on christmas. The turtles cute, everything is well painted. Sturdy, solid.
customer_reviews.author: Meoki

customer_reviews.title: Turtle lovers collectible
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute but a bit smaller than I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Shazie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift fir my baby sister and she absolutely loves it. Recently she and I did s survey to find out ehst our Spirit animal us and both if us came back as the turtle. We both seemed to enjoy that result and I wanted her to have s good example if one. The quality of this piece is high. Very well made and very giftsble
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Joseph

customer_reviews.title: sea turtle snow globe
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend that collects sea turtles. They absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this snowglobe. My only complaint is the green glitter inside. I like the snow look better, or something sea like. But I still like the globe.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull BUT!
customer_reviews.text: Great little globe and all, but the rear flipper on the turtle was broken off before they put the globe together. Quality Control much?
customer_reviews.author: Doug Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a Christmas present for my mother in law
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken and couldn't gift it to my mother in law. Was very disappointed because it was so beautiful and she loves turtles. =(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift for Granddaughter, as a collector of Snow Globes. Very happy. thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Terry Carter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I purchased for my granddaughter, she is in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Magdiel

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not as good as it could be.
customer_reviews.text: The paint on the base was dull and chipped. I repainted it myself using translucent acrylic paints and now it’s great. All the glitter of the snow inside didn’t go with the dull paint outside. And, actually, the paint on the inside could have been better too but it wasn’t as obvious a problem as the paint on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 6 y/o nephew and he just loved it. It's good quality construction and beautifully artistic.
customer_reviews.author: heihammy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful it is smaller than what you might think but worked perfect for our son !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in 1 day in perfect condition, decent sized and very cute. Gave to my little sister for her birthday and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful snowglobe!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend for her birthday since she likes non-christmas snowglobes. She loves it. They just forgot to paint a spot on the very bottom of it.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Hall

customer_reviews.title: it makes a good gift for someone who collects snow globes
customer_reviews.text: was a little smaller than i realized, even with the posted dimensions. it makes a good gift for someone who collects snow globes, the artword is very good and its well made.
customer_reviews.author: courtney osborne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully detailed little globe... would be nice if it was a little bigger but it was a nice teacher appreciation gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Kind of cheap looking. Basically one you would at a gift shop at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: A good gift
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with how fast I got this item and it's smaller then I thought it would be but it's nicer to look at in person so all and all it's a good gift for a turtle lover
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Am I turrtley enough for the tuuurrtle club?
customer_reviews.text: Some of the paint is chipped and the turtle in the globe wasn't painted very well. Other then that very pretty

customer_reviews.title: COLLECTIBLE SNOW GLOBE

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.text: The advertisement was misleading product was entirely too small for the amount of money paid for the product

customer_reviews.text: It is super cute but WAY smaller then expected. For the money I feel like it should be a bit bigger but still super adorable.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for value

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but runs small

product_meta.description: This gorgeous 3. 75 Inch marine life snow globe with sea turtle statue figurine has the finest details and highest quality you will find anywhere! 3. 75 Inch marine life snow globe with sea turtle statue figurine is truly remarkable. 3. 75 Inch marine life snow globe with sea turtle statue figurine details; condition: brand new; item SKU: ss-g-28057; dimensions: h: 3. 75 (Inches); crafted with: poly resin.
